comments.body: Don't you need to update `SparkBuild.scala` so that the sbt build picks this up?

comments.body:
I think it has to be modified. Don't know how exactly built until now. I've just executed `./build/sbt package` again and still works without any change. Strange...

@srowen do you have any idea?

comments.body: Yeah, just wanted to know where/how exactly its used. Later we may have problem because we need reference to `token-provider-kafka-0-10` in multiple places. Namely inside `sqlProjects` and `streamingProjects` and don't know whether it's handled properly. But that's not an issue now.
